sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import GiftModel from 'src/app/models/gift-model'; import TargetAudienceModel from 'src/app/models/targetAudience-model'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.css'] }) export class ListComponent implements OnInit { public targetAudience:TargetAudienceModel[]=[] public gifts:GiftModel[] public constructor( private dataService:DataService){} public async ngOnInit(){ try { this.targetAudience= await this.dataService.getAllTargetAudience() } catch (error) { } } public async displayGifts(args:Event){ try { const selectElement=args.target as HTMLSelectElement const value=+selectElement.value console.log(value) this.gifts=await this.dataService.getGiftsByTargetAudience(value) } catch (error:any) { alert(error.message) } } public async deleteCard(id: number) { try { if(!window.confirm("Are you sure?")) return; await this.dataService.deleteGift(id) alert("Movie has been deleted"); const index = this.gifts.findIndex(g => g.giftId === id); if (index > -1) { this.gifts.splice(index, 1); } } catch (error) { } } }
